column5: I m thinking of visiting Balbuzard Sauvage lodge in northern Quebec and I would like to KNow about; the fishing, owners, cabins, boats, meals, the road on the drive in. Plz Reply

I have a water access cottage in NW Quebec north of there. One the locals who's become a very good friend goes every year and raves about it. 5 star all the way, and some pretty big walleye. He's been trying to get me to go with him for a few years, but it's too pricey for me. Pretty positive the road is fine. If no one else answers your post I can try and contact him with your questions.
I too am think about booking any info would greatly help.
Just booked July 15 hope fishing is good can't wait to drown some worms!
